text: tatha jo eemaan laaye, unhonne kaha ki kyon nahin utaaree jaatee koee soorah (jisamen yudhd ka aadesh ho?) to jab ek drdh soorah utaar dee gayee tatha usamen varnan kar diya gaya yudhd ka, to aapane unhen dekh liya, jinake dilon mein rog (dvidha) hai ki ve aapakee or usake samaan dekh rahe hain, jo maut ke samay achet pada hua ho. to unake lie uttam hai
